scripts.install:backend: npm install && cd DeliverUS-Backend && npm install
scripts.test:backend: npm run migrate:backend && cd DeliverUS-Backend && npm test
scripts.install:all:win: npm run copy:env:win && npm run install:backend && npm run migrate:backend
scripts.install:all:bash: npm run copy:env:bash && npm run install:backend && npm run migrate:backend
